item.title: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
item.content:encoded: There is no innocent explanation for the toxin being found in samples taken from Navalny's body, Foreign Office says.

item.title: Could Manchester be a model for the UK to kickstart growth?
item.content:encoded: With an annual growth rate of 3.1%, Manchester's economy has performed twice as well as that of the UK as a whole.

item.content:encoded: Wayne Rooney and Alan Shearer believe referees are "petrified" of making decisions without the "safety net of VAR", after the officials award a free-kick instead of a penalty despite Aston Villa's Lucas Digne handling the ball in the box.
